no-tray-menu.why-zh: 这是一个演示demo：如果无法再指定语言的翻译文件中找到相关内容，翻译器将自动选择备用语言进行翻译（如英语）。
no-tray-menu.why-eg: This is a demo: if the relevant content cannot be found in the translation file in the specified language, the translator will automatically select an alternate language for translation (such as English).
